attributes.action: Change the law on hitting and killing cats when driving
attributes.additional_details: If you hit a dog with a vehicle you get charged for injuries or killing a dog when run over so the law should be the same when it comes to cats , yesterday one of my cats was killed by a driver she would of been on way home for food this happened around 7.15 am it was light the driver hit her head killing her instantly. So I want the law changed to the same as it is if you run over and kill a dog
attributes.background: I would like to see the law changed if someone drives and hits a cat and killing them as they are peoples pets and they are family.

rejection.details:
We are very sorry to hear about the death of your cat. Please accept our condolences.

You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607317
